org.raistlic.common.assertion

Interface NumberAssertion<N extends java.lang.Number & java.lang.Comparable<N>>

  • Type Parameters:
    N - the actual type of the wrapped candidate.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Assertion<N,NumberAssertion<N>>

    public interface NumberAssertion<N extends java.lang.Number & java.lang.Comparable<N>>
extends Assertion<N,NumberAssertion<N>>
    Defines a collection of useful checks around a wrapped Number candidate.
